00028 /*
00029  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00030  * Lustre is a trademark of Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00031  *
00032  * lustre/ofd/ofd_lvb.c
00033  *
00034  * This file contains methods for OBD Filter Device (OFD)
00035  * Lock Value Block (LVB) operations.
00036  *
00037  * LVB is special opaque (to LDLM) data that is associated with an LDLM lock
00038  * and transferred from client to server and back. OFD LVBs are used to
00039  * maintain current object size/times.
00040  *
00041  * Author: Andreas Dilger <andreas.dilger@intel.com>
00042  * Author: Mikhail Pershin <mike.pershin@intel.com>
00043  * Author: Alexey Zhuravlev <alexey.zhuravlev@intel.com>
00044  */
00045 
00046 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_FILTER
00047 
00048 #include <lustre_swab.h>
00049 #include "ofd_internal.h"
00050 
00062 static int ofd_lvbo_free(struct ldlm_resource *res)
00063 {
00064         if (res->lr_lvb_data)
00065                 OBD_FREE(res->lr_lvb_data, res->lr_lvb_len);
00066 
00067         return 0;
00068 }
00069 
00085 static int ofd_lvbo_init(struct ldlm_resource *res)
00086 {
00087         struct ost_lvb          *lvb;
00088         struct ofd_device       *ofd;
00089         struct ofd_object       *fo;
00090         struct ofd_thread_info  *info;
00091         struct lu_env            env;
00092         int                      rc = 0;
00093 
00094         ENTRY;
00095 
00096         LASSERT(res);
00097         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(&res->lr_lvb_mutex));
00098 
00099         if (res->lr_lvb_data != NULL)
00100                 RETURN(0);
00101 
00102         ofd = ldlm_res_to_ns(res)->ns_lvbp;
00103         LASSERT(ofd != NULL);
00104 
00105         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LDLM_OST_LVB))
00106                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00107 
00108         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_DT_THREAD);
00109         if (rc)
00110                 RETURN(rc);
00111 
00112         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lvb);
00113         if (lvb == NULL)
00114                 GOTO(out_env, rc = -ENOMEM);
00115 
00116         res->lr_lvb_data = lvb;
00117         res->lr_lvb_len = sizeof(*lvb);
00118 
00119         info = ofd_info_init(&env, NULL);
00120         ost_fid_from_resid(&info->fti_fid, &res->lr_name,
00121                            ofd->ofd_lut.lut_lsd.lsd_osd_index);
00122         fo = ofd_object_find(&env, ofd, &info->fti_fid);
00123         if (IS_ERR(fo))
00124                 GOTO(out_lvb, rc = PTR_ERR(fo));
00125 
00126         rc = ofd_attr_get(&env, fo, &info->fti_attr);
00127         if (rc)
00128                 GOTO(out_obj, rc);
00129 
00130         lvb->lvb_size = info->fti_attr.la_size;
00131         lvb->lvb_blocks = info->fti_attr.la_blocks;
00132         lvb->lvb_mtime = info->fti_attr.la_mtime;
00133         lvb->lvb_atime = info->fti_attr.la_atime;
00134         lvb->lvb_ctime = info->fti_attr.la_ctime;
00135 
00136         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" initial lvb size: "LPU64", "
00137                "mtime: "LPX64", blocks: "LPX64"\n",
00138                PFID(&info->fti_fid), lvb->lvb_size,
00139                lvb->lvb_mtime, lvb->lvb_blocks);
00140 
00141         EXIT;
00142 out_obj:
00143         ofd_object_put(&env, fo);
00144 out_lvb:
00145         if (rc != 0)
00146                 OST_LVB_SET_ERR(lvb->lvb_blocks, rc);
00147 out_env:
00148         lu_env_fini(&env);
00149         /* Don't free lvb data on lookup error */
00150         return rc;
00151 }
00152 
00182 static int ofd_lvbo_update(struct ldlm_resource *res,
00183                            struct ptlrpc_request *req, int increase_only)
00184 {
00185         struct ofd_device       *ofd;
00186         struct ofd_object       *fo;
00187         struct ofd_thread_info  *info;
00188         struct ost_lvb          *lvb;
00189         struct lu_env            env;
00190         int                      rc = 0;
00191 
00192         ENTRY;
00193 
00194         LASSERT(res != NULL);
00195 
00196         ofd = ldlm_res_to_ns(res)->ns_lvbp;
00197         LASSERT(ofd != NULL);
00198 
00199         rc = lu_env_init(&env, LCT_DT_THREAD);
00200         if (rc)
00201                 RETURN(rc);
00202 
00203         info = ofd_info_init(&env, NULL);
00204         fid_extract_from_res_name(&info->fti_fid, &res->lr_name);
00205 
00206         lvb = res->lr_lvb_data;
00207         if (lvb == NULL) {
00208                 CERROR("%s: no LVB data for "DFID"\n",
00209                        ofd_name(ofd), PFID(&info->fti_fid));
00210                 GOTO(out_env, rc = 0);
00211         }
00212 
00213         /* Update the LVB from the network message */
00214         if (req != NULL) {
00215                 struct ost_lvb *rpc_lvb;
00216                 bool lvb_type;
00217 
00218                 if (req->rq_import != NULL)
00219                         lvb_type = imp_connect_lvb_type(req->rq_import);
00220                 else
00221                         lvb_type = exp_connect_lvb_type(req->rq_export);
00222 
00223                 if (!lvb_type) {
00224                         struct ost_lvb_v1 *lvb_v1;
00225 
00226                         lvb_v1 = req_capsule_server_swab_get(&req->rq_pill,
00227                                         &RMF_DLM_LVB, lustre_swab_ost_lvb_v1);
00228                         if (lvb_v1 == NULL)
00229                                 goto disk_update;
00230 
00231                         rpc_lvb = &info->fti_lvb;
00232                         memcpy(rpc_lvb, lvb_v1, sizeof *lvb_v1);
00233                         rpc_lvb->lvb_mtime_ns = 0;
00234                         rpc_lvb->lvb_atime_ns = 0;
00235                         rpc_lvb->lvb_ctime_ns = 0;
00236                 } else {
00237                         rpc_lvb = req_capsule_server_swab_get(&req->rq_pill,
00238                                                               &RMF_DLM_LVB,
00239                                                         lustre_swab_ost_lvb);
00240                         if (rpc_lvb == NULL)
00241                                 goto disk_update;
00242                 }
00243 
00244                 lock_res(res);
00245                 if (rpc_lvb->lvb_size > lvb->lvb_size || !increase_only) {
00246                         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb size: "
00247                                LPU64" -> "LPU64"\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00248                                lvb->lvb_size, rpc_lvb->lvb_size);
00249                         lvb->lvb_size = rpc_lvb->lvb_size;
00250                 }
00251                 if (rpc_lvb->lvb_mtime > lvb->lvb_mtime || !increase_only) {
00252                         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb mtime: "
00253                                LPU64" -> "LPU64"\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00254                                lvb->lvb_mtime, rpc_lvb->lvb_mtime);
00255                         lvb->lvb_mtime = rpc_lvb->lvb_mtime;
00256                 }
00257                 if (rpc_lvb->lvb_atime > lvb->lvb_atime || !increase_only) {
00258                         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb atime: "
00259                                LPU64" -> "LPU64"\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00260                                lvb->lvb_atime, rpc_lvb->lvb_atime);
00261                         lvb->lvb_atime = rpc_lvb->lvb_atime;
00262                 }
00263                 if (rpc_lvb->lvb_ctime > lvb->lvb_ctime || !increase_only) {
00264                         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb ctime: "
00265                                LPU64" -> "LPU64"\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00266                                lvb->lvb_ctime, rpc_lvb->lvb_ctime);
00267                         lvb->lvb_ctime = rpc_lvb->lvb_ctime;
00268                 }
00269                 if (rpc_lvb->lvb_blocks > lvb->lvb_blocks || !increase_only) {
00270                         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb blocks: "
00271                                LPU64" -> "LPU64"\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00272                                lvb->lvb_blocks, rpc_lvb->lvb_blocks);
00273                         lvb->lvb_blocks = rpc_lvb->lvb_blocks;
00274                 }
00275                 unlock_res(res);
00276         }
00277 
00278 disk_update:
00279         /* Update the LVB from the disk inode */
00280         ost_fid_from_resid(&info->fti_fid, &res->lr_name,
00281                            ofd->ofd_lut.lut_lsd.lsd_osd_index);
00282         fo = ofd_object_find(&env, ofd, &info->fti_fid);
00283         if (IS_ERR(fo))
00284                 GOTO(out_env, rc = PTR_ERR(fo));
00285 
00286         rc = ofd_attr_get(&env, fo, &info->fti_attr);
00287         if (rc)
00288                 GOTO(out_obj, rc);
00289 
00290         lock_res(res);
00291         if (info->fti_attr.la_size > lvb->lvb_size || !increase_only) {
00292                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb size from disk: "
00293                        LPU64" -> %llu\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00294                        lvb->lvb_size, info->fti_attr.la_size);
00295                 lvb->lvb_size = info->fti_attr.la_size;
00296         }
00297 
00298         if (info->fti_attr.la_mtime >lvb->lvb_mtime || !increase_only) {
00299                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb mtime from disk: "
00300                        LPU64" -> "LPU64"\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00301                        lvb->lvb_mtime, info->fti_attr.la_mtime);
00302                 lvb->lvb_mtime = info->fti_attr.la_mtime;
00303         }
00304         if (info->fti_attr.la_atime >lvb->lvb_atime || !increase_only) {
00305                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb atime from disk: "
00306                        LPU64" -> "LPU64"\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00307                        lvb->lvb_atime, info->fti_attr.la_atime);
00308                 lvb->lvb_atime = info->fti_attr.la_atime;
00309         }
00310         if (info->fti_attr.la_ctime >lvb->lvb_ctime || !increase_only) {
00311                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb ctime from disk: "
00312                        LPU64" -> "LPU64"\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid),
00313                        lvb->lvb_ctime, info->fti_attr.la_ctime);
00314                 lvb->lvb_ctime = info->fti_attr.la_ctime;
00315         }
00316         if (info->fti_attr.la_blocks > lvb->lvb_blocks || !increase_only) {
00317                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "res: "DFID" updating lvb blocks from disk: "
00318                        LPU64" -> %llu\n", PFID(&info->fti_fid), lvb->lvb_blocks,
00319                        (unsigned long long)info->fti_attr.la_blocks);
00320                 lvb->lvb_blocks = info->fti_attr.la_blocks;
00321         }
00322         unlock_res(res);
00323 
00324 out_obj:
00325         ofd_object_put(&env, fo);
00326 out_env:
00327         lu_env_fini(&env);
00328         return rc;
00329 }
00330 
00342 static int ofd_lvbo_size(struct ldlm_lock *lock)
00343 {
00344         if (lock->l_export != NULL && exp_connect_lvb_type(lock->l_export))
00345                 return sizeof(struct ost_lvb);
00346         else
00347                 return sizeof(struct ost_lvb_v1);
00348 }
00349 
00361 static int ofd_lvbo_fill(struct ldlm_lock *lock, void *buf, int buflen)
00362 {
00363         struct ldlm_resource *res = lock->l_resource;
00364         int lvb_len;
00365 
00366         /* Former lvbo_init not allocate the "LVB". */
00367         if (unlikely(res->lr_lvb_len == 0))
00368                 return 0;
00369 
00370         lvb_len = ofd_lvbo_size(lock);
00371         LASSERT(lvb_len <= res->lr_lvb_len);
00372 
00373         if (lvb_len > buflen)
00374                 lvb_len = buflen;
00375 
00376         lock_res(res);
00377         memcpy(buf, res->lr_lvb_data, lvb_len);
00378         unlock_res(res);
00379 
00380         return lvb_len;
00381 }
00382 
00383 struct ldlm_valblock_ops ofd_lvbo = {
00384         .lvbo_init      = ofd_lvbo_init,
00385         .lvbo_update    = ofd_lvbo_update,
00386         .lvbo_free      = ofd_lvbo_free,
00387         .lvbo_size      = ofd_lvbo_size,
00388         .lvbo_fill      = ofd_lvbo_fill
00389 };
